sentences.en: A boat must be made of buoyant material.
sentences.cn: 船一定要用有浮力的材料来做.

sentences.en: Analysts expect the share price to remain buoyant.
sentences.cn: 分析家们预期股票价格将持续上涨。

sentences.en: Children are usually more buoyant than adults.
sentences.cn: 孩子往往比成年人快乐.

sentences.en: Cork is a very buoyant material.
sentences.cn: 软木是极易浮起的材料.

sentences.en: He was too buoyant, too full of ruddy life, too assured.
sentences.cn: 他太轻浮快活, 太爱寻欢作乐, 又太自信了.

sentences.en: High interest rates do not point to a buoyant market this year.
sentences.cn: 今年的高利率并不表明市场繁荣。

sentences.en: In trouble he is always buoyant.
sentences.cn: 在困难的时候,他总是精神振作的.

sentences.en: It takes a very buoyant personality to cope with constant rejection.
sentences.cn: 接受一再遭拒的结果需要非常乐天的性格.

sentences.en: My physical strength came back to me quickly in that buoyant atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 在那生机盎然的地方我的体力迅速地恢复了.

sentences.en: This was such a small and buoyant boat.
Till morning dawned I was tossed on a buoyant but unquiet sea.
sentences.cn: 我在欢快而不安的海洋上颠簸,直到早晨.

sentences.en: We have a buoyant economy and unemployment is considerably lower than the regional average.
sentences.cn: 我们经济繁荣，失业率远低于地区平均水平。

sentences.en: We were in a buoyant mood after winning our match.
sentences.cn: 我们赢了比赛,心情很振奋.

sentences.en: When we are in buoyant health , death is all but unimaginable.
sentences.cn: 我们身强力壮时根本想不到死.

sentences.en: While there is still sufficient trapped air within the container to keep it buoyant, it will float.
sentences.cn: 只要容器里还留有足够的空气，它就会漂浮着。

words.tran_cn: 浮力；轻快；轻松的心情；（股票）保持高价或回升

trans.tran_cn: 轻快的，活泼的，开朗的，有浮力的，易浮的，（价格等）上涨的
trans.tran_en: buoyant prices etc tend to rise
